Oct. 5, 2013 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Fourth Section)

Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Nanette Jones, Solo Cornet Ebbw Valley Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 4 bands competed.
